item.title: Welcome to our web site
item.description:
Welcome to our web site

This letting is located in the beautiful setting of Nerja, on the costa del sol in Spain. Nestled On the Spanish Mediterranean it's a bustling yet unspoiled fishing village. Full of fine restaurants, smart cafes, great beaches and bohemian shops.

item.title: Apartment Information
item.description:
Apartment Information

This letting is a two bedroom apartment in Acapulco Playa with a contemporary feel. Located in the idyllic setting of Nerja, situated on the Spanish Mediterranean. The apartment is furnished to very high standards and has pool, beach and mountainside views. It is an ideal location for any holiday.

item.title: Location Information
item.description:
Location Information

Nerja is located on the Spanish Costa del sol. On the Mediterranean east of Malaga, it's nearest city. It is roughly 5 hours 51 minutes from Madrid and 42 minutes from Malaga.
